actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution to appoint a Senator to the Senate Select Committee on Ethics, pursuant to the provisions of S.Res.169 of the 102nd Congress.

summary.text: Appoints Senator Pryor to the Senate Select Committee on Ethics with respect to: (1) the preliminary inquiries into the conduct of Senators Cranston, DeConcini, Glenn, McCain, and Riegle; and (2) the investigation into the conduct of Senator Cranston.

titles.title: A resolution to appoint a Senator to the Senate Select Committee on Ethics, pursuant to the provisions of S.Res.169 of the 102nd Congress.
